    • Constructor Detail

      • Neighborhood

        public Neighborhood(org.liris.smartgov.simulator.urban.geo.utils.LatLon[] perimeter,
                    LezCriteria deliveryLezCriteria,
                    LezCriteria privateLezCriteria,
                    Surveillance surveillance,
                    java.lang.String id)
        Neighborhood constructor.
        Parameters:
        perimeter - polygon that describes the perimeter of the neighborhood. If the polygon is not closed, it will be completed automatically.
        deliveryLezCriteria - criteria associated to this neighborhood that determines which delivery vehicles are allowed or not
        privateLezCriteria - criteria associated to this neighborhood that determines which private vehicles are allowed or not
        surveillance - surveillance deployed in the neighborhood
        neighborhood's - id

        public void giveSatisfaction(double satisfaction,
                             boolean changedVehicle,
                             boolean changedMobility,
                             boolean fraud)
        Allows agents to give their satisfaction to this neighborhood.
        Parameters:
        satisfaction - the satisfaction to be given
        changedVehicle - whether or not the agent changed his vehicle.
        changedMobility - whether or not the agent changed mobility.
        fraud - whether or not the agent frauded.

      • costs

        public org.liris.smartgov.simulator.core.environment.graph.astar.Costs costs(Vehicle vehicle)
        Returns the cost function associated to this vehicle, depending on its permission to enter the LEZ or not.
        • If the vehicle is allowed, a normal DistanceCosts is returned, as if the lez did not exist for this vehicle.
        • Else, LezCosts are used.
        Parameters:
        deliveryVehicle - vehicle
        Returns:
        cost function associated to the specified vehicle in the current urban area

      • isAllowed

      • contains

        public boolean contains(org.liris.smartgov.simulator.urban.osm.environment.graph.OsmNode node)
        Determines if the specified osm node is contained in the lez, thanks to a JTS Point-In-Polygon algorithm.
        Parameters:
        node - osm node
        Returns:
        true if and only if the node is strictly contained in this LEZ

      • none

        public static Neighborhood none()
        Returns a special LEZ instance with no perimeter and all vehicles allowed, that can be smartly used by scenarios with a lez parameter to compare results with or without LEZ.
        Returns:
        a lez with absolutely no restriction
